public class MonthDay {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i;
		i=1;
		switch(i)
		{
		case 1:
			System.out.println("month is jan days is 31");
			break;
		case 2:
			System.out.println("month is feb days is 28");
			break;
		case 3:
			System.out.println("month is march days is 31");
			break;
		case 4:
			System.out.println("month is april days is 30");
			break;
		case 5:
			System.out.println("month is may days is 31");
			break;
		case 6:
			System.out.println("month is june days is 30");
			break;
		case 7:
			System.out.println("month is july days is 31");
			break;
		case 8:
			System.out.println("month is aug days is 31");
			break;
		case 9:
			System.out.println("month is sept days is 30");
			break;
		case 10:
			System.out.println("month is oct days is 31");
			break;
		case 11:
			System.out.println("month is nov days is 30");
			break;
		case 12:
			System.out.println("month is dec days is 31");
			break;
		default:
				System.out.println("no month");
		}

	}

}
